original_text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:
korean_text: 한 달란트 받았던 자는 와서 이르되 주인이여 당신은 굳은 사람이라 심지 않은 데서 거두고 헤치지 않은 데서 모으는 줄을 내가 알았으므로

sentences.original_text: Then he which had received the one talent came
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 달란트를 받았던 그가 와서

sentences.original_text: that thou art an hard man,
reaping where thou hast not sown,
and gathering where thou hast not strawed:
sentences.korean_translation: 흩뿌리지 않은 곳에서 모으는 줄을 알았습니다
